scripts.stylus: if [ -d stylus ]; then (stylus -w -u nib -o css/ stylus/); fi
scripts.coffee: coffee -wo js/ coffee/  # no use require
scripts.build: npm run jade & npm run stylus & npm run coffee
scripts.start: npm run build & npm run watch
scripts.preinstall: mkdir -p coffee jade; npm run jade:config
scripts.install: npm link coffee-script jade markdown stylus livereloadx webpack coffee-loader nib  # need to install globally
